  • Welcome to the Town of Culpeper

    "One of the 10 Best Small Towns in America."

    The Town of Culpeper naturally blends a rich history with a prosperous future.

  • Yowell Meadow Park is easily accessible from Downtown Culpeper

    and surrounding areas. It offers a level, paved one-mile walking trail a more adventurous nature trail, skate park, and playground.

  • LOVE sculpture.

    This work of art is located near the Train Depot.

    Show your love for Culpeper, pose for pictures in front of this work of art, with family, your love of your life or just friends.

  • Mountain Run Lake Park

    One of the several parks owned by the Town.

    Featuring playgrounds, outdoor event spaces and beautiful views.

  • Nature at it's best in the Town.

    Throughout several locations

    you will find all aspects of nature surrounding you.

  • Lake Pelham is

    one of the Town of Culpeper's hidden gems.

    Great for fishing and picnicking.

  • Gnarly Hops

    an Annual Beer Fest held downtown,

    featuring local breweries and craft beers.

  • Wine Street Memorial Park

    Designed to honor local veterans of World War II and the Korean War, dedicated in 2008

    This family park features a central memorial pad containing inscribed brick pavers surrounded

    by memorial benches, and includes a playground and a separate area with two picnic tables.

    • 1234
